Moons of Jupiter

Jupiter has lots and lots of moons.

List of Large Jovian Moons

  • Callisto
    Discovered by:
    Galileo Galilei
    Discovered on:
    1610-01-07

    Io is the innermost of the four moons.

  • Europha
    Discovered by:
    Galileo Galilei
    Discovered on:
    1610-01-08

    Io is the innermost of the four moons.

  • Ganymede
    Discovered by:
    Galileo Galilei
    Discovered on:
    1610-01-08

    Io is the innermost of the four moons.

  • Io
    Discovered by:
    Galileo Galilei
    Discovered on:
    1610-01-08

    Io is the innermost of the four moons.
